title: Watch: Biden Calls Him "President Putin". How Ukraine's Zelensky Reacted
content: In yet another gaffe amid concerns over his re-election bid, US President Joe Biden today mistakenly introduced his Ukraine counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky as his Russian rival Vladimir Putin.
summary: In yet another gaffe amid concerns over his re-election bid, US President Joe Biden today mistakenly introduced his Ukraine counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky as his Russian rival Vladimir Putin.

title: Woolly Mammoth DNA, Frozen 52,000 Years, Ago May Be Used To Revive Species
content: About 52,000 years ago, the skinned hide of a Siberian woolly mammoth was exposed to conditions so frigid that it spontaneously freeze-dried, locking its DNA fragments into place.
summary: About 52,000 years ago, the skinned hide of a Siberian woolly mammoth was exposed to conditions so frigid that it spontaneously freeze-dried, locking its DNA fragments into place.

title: "Would Be A Shot In The Arm For...": Ex PMs Tell G20 To Tax Super-Rich
content: Former presidents and prime ministers have sent an open letter to current leaders of the world's 20 largest economies urging support for a global tax on billionaires, which they called a rare political opportunity.
summary: Former presidents and prime ministers have sent an open letter to current leaders of the world's 20 largest economies urging support for a global tax on billionaires, which they called a rare political opportunity.

title: Biden Denies Reports Of 8 pm Bedtime, But Says He Needs To Pace Himself
content: US President Joe Biden on Thursday denied needing to be in bed by 8:00 pm as he faced a barrage of questions from reporters about a disastrous debate performance.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Thursday denied needing to be in bed by 8:00 pm as he faced a barrage of questions from reporters about a disastrous debate performance.

title: US President Joe Biden Says Neurological Exams Find Him In "Good Shape"
content: US President Joe Biden, seeking to allay concerns about his mental fitness as he seeks reelection, said Thursday that neurological exams found he is in "good shape."
summary: US President Joe Biden, seeking to allay concerns about his mental fitness as he seeks reelection, said Thursday that neurological exams found he is in "good shape."

title: Joe Biden Says Kamala Harris Is "Qualified To Be President"
content: US President Joe Biden on Thursday said his deputy, Vice President Kamala Harris, is "qualified" to lead the county.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Thursday said his deputy, Vice President Kamala Harris, is "qualified" to lead the county.

title: Watch: Giorgia Meloni Rolls Eyes As Biden Is Late For NATO Summit
content: Another person standing with Ms Meloni and Finnish President Alexander Stubb pulled out his phone to check the time, and the Italian PM rolled her eyes again before noticing the cameras.
summary: Another person standing with Ms Meloni and Finnish President Alexander Stubb pulled out his phone to check the time, and the Italian PM rolled her eyes again before noticing the cameras.

title: By 2100, India's Population To Decline, But Still 2.5 Times That Of China
content: India's population is projected to peak in the early 2060s at about 1.7 billion and then decline by 12 per cent, but the country will remain the world's most populous throughout the century, the United Nations has said.
summary: India's population is projected to peak in the early 2060s at about 1.7 billion and then decline by 12 per cent, but the country will remain the world's most populous throughout the century, the United Nations has said.

title: Trump Seeks "Absolute Immunity", Wants Hush Money Conviction Tossed Out
content: Lawyers for Donald Trump on Thursday asked the judge who presided over his hush money trial to throw out his conviction, citing the recent Supreme Court ruling that a former US president enjoys broad immunity from prosecution.
summary: Lawyers for Donald Trump on Thursday asked the judge who presided over his hush money trial to throw out his conviction, citing the recent Supreme Court ruling that a former US president enjoys broad immunity from prosecution.

title: OpenAI Scale Ranks Progress Toward Human-Level Problem Solving
content: OpenAI has said for years that it's working to build what's often referred to as artificial general intelligence, or AGI - essentially, computers that can do a better job on most tasks than people.
summary: OpenAI has said for years that it's working to build what's often referred to as artificial general intelligence, or AGI - essentially, computers that can do a better job on most tasks than people.

title: Apart From Biden And Trump, These Are 5 Other Key Candidates In US Polls
content: Democratic President Joe Biden and Republican former President Donald Trump will face each other in the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election, after a divisive, closely fought contest. Several third-party hopefuls are also running.
summary: Democratic President Joe Biden and Republican former President Donald Trump will face each other in the Nov. 5 U.S. presidential election, after a divisive, closely fought contest. Several third-party hopefuls are also running.

title: Opinion: Air Vistara: An Aviation Icon Fades Away, And The Chaos It Leaves Behind
content: Vistara, with its reputation for service excellence and 70 new planes, contrasts sharply with Air India's outdated fleet. It is baffling that the Civil Aviation Ministry allowed the merger of a modern, well-functioning airline like Vistara with an ou
summary: Vistara, with its reputation for service excellence and 70 new planes, contrasts sharply with Air India's outdated fleet. It is baffling that the Civil Aviation Ministry allowed the merger of a modern, well-functioning airline like Vistara with an ou

title: "No Good Reason" To Talk To Putin, Says US President Biden
content: US President Joe Biden has said that he has "no good reason" to talk to Vladimir Putin at the moment unless the Russian leader changes his behaviour.
summary: US President Joe Biden has said that he has "no good reason" to talk to Vladimir Putin at the moment unless the Russian leader changes his behaviour.

title: South Korea Set To Deploy 'StarWars' Laser Weapons For Drone Defence
content: South Korea on Thursday announced that it is ready to start mass-producing laser weapons like those in the 'Star Wars' franchise to shoot down North Korean drones.
summary: South Korea on Thursday announced that it is ready to start mass-producing laser weapons like those in the 'Star Wars' franchise to shoot down North Korean drones.

title: Indian Man, 25, Arrested For Groping At Canada Water Park
content: An Indian origin man was arrested for groping women at a public water park in Canada on July 7, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said in a statement.
summary: An Indian origin man was arrested for groping women at a public water park in Canada on July 7, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police said in a statement.

title: "Spared Nothing": Israel Bombs Gaza Killing 25 In "Fiercest" Week Of War
content: Israel rained bombs on Gaza City during a week that residents described as comparable to the fiercest battle of the war, while a Palestinian Islamic Jihad official on Thursday said a new round of peace talks ended with no agreements yet.
summary: Israel rained bombs on Gaza City during a week that residents described as comparable to the fiercest battle of the war, while a Palestinian Islamic Jihad official on Thursday said a new round of peace talks ended with no agreements yet.

title: Landslide Sweeps Two Passenger Bus In Central Nepal Highway, 60 Missing
content: At least five dozen people are suspected to be missing after a landslide along the Madan-Ashrit Highway in Central Nepal swept two passenger buses in early Friday morning.
summary: At least five dozen people are suspected to be missing after a landslide along the Madan-Ashrit Highway in Central Nepal swept two passenger buses in early Friday morning.

title: Alec Baldwin, Charged With Involuntary Manslaughter, Had Live Rounds On Set
content: Live rounds were found in the cartridge belts of Alec Baldwin and another actor on the set of a Western movie that was the scene of a fatal shooting, a police technician testified Thursday at the trial of the Hollywood star.
summary: Live rounds were found in the cartridge belts of Alec Baldwin and another actor on the set of a Western movie that was the scene of a fatal shooting, a police technician testified Thursday at the trial of the Hollywood star.

title: "Slips Of Tongue Happen": NATO Allies Back Gaffing Joe Biden
content: All was going according to plan. President Joe Biden was projecting himself as the leader of the free world as he hosted a NATO summit and then, in a moment, an embarrassing slip of the tongue.
summary: All was going according to plan. President Joe Biden was projecting himself as the leader of the free world as he hosted a NATO summit and then, in a moment, an embarrassing slip of the tongue.

title: In Latest Gaffe, Biden Calls Kamala Harris "Vice President Trump"
content: US President Joe Biden defiantly insisted Thursday that he will run for another term and win, as a series of verbal gaffes while leading a major summit threw a harsh new spotlight on his fitness.
summary: US President Joe Biden defiantly insisted Thursday that he will run for another term and win, as a series of verbal gaffes while leading a major summit threw a harsh new spotlight on his fitness.
